data.title: Elections: Croatian Assembly 2020 General
data.text:
Population and number of registered voters:

· Population: 4,227,746 (July 2020 est.) [1]

· Registered Voters: 3,719,741 (2019) [2]

Gender Data:

· Female Population: 2,188,488 (2020 est.) [3]

· Is Croatia a signatory to CEDAW: No

· Has Croatia ratified CEDAW: Yes, succession (9 September 1992) [4]

· Gender Quota: Yes [5]

· Female candidates in this election: Yes

· Number of Female Parliamentarians: 31 (20.5%) [6]

· Human Development Index Position: 46 [7]

· Social Institutions and Gender Index (SIGI) Categorization: N/A

Disability Data:

· Is Croatia a signatory to CRPD: Yes (30 March 2007)

· Has Croatia ratified CRPD: Yes (15 August 2007) [8]
